name: WW2 Air Attack - Realistic World War 2 Airplanes
name_original: WW2 Air Attack - Realistic World War 2 Airplanes
description:
Download this game and have fun piloting aircrafts during the Second World War. Feel like a real pilot of the Second World War!
You will have to be very focused to keep yourself safe in this air strike to take your warplane to the top. You will be a member of the Air Force, show your speed and become the most feared rider in this battle.

Real classic World War II Aircrafts
In this Air Force game you will pilot four of the most famous airplanes of the World War II. The models are carefuly designed to let you fly your plane with realism feeling. Choose your favorite among the TBM Avenger 3U, the MAVAG Heja II, the Junkers Ju 87 and the Blackburn Skua and show who rules in the air!

Realistic Shootings
You objective in this aerial battle looks simple: survive the attacks. Sounds easy, right? But enemies aircrafts try to shoot you! Dodge them,shoot them down and win the Second World War. Be a hero.

Simple controls
It is not easy to find an original aircraft game like this one with such simple controls.
Push the button to attack and shoot the bullets, let the battle begin! To control the plane just tilt the mobile to one side to another.

Features of this warplane game:
◉ WWII environment
◉ Awesome classic aircrafts
◉ Shooting and explosions
◉ Extreme Speed
◉ Leaderboards
◉ Simple and intuitive controls
◉ Realistic sounds
◉ Stunning graphics
◉ Free!

Get in to you pilot uniform, drive your bomber and be the leader of the Air Force!

We invite you to download our Second World War Aircraft game and to leave us comments and good ratings, so we can give you new awesome aircraft models!

You can also make internal purchases to directly unlock all the items if you don't want to unlock them playing! This also helps the developers and is a good way to reward their work.

Thank you pilot!

Remember your mission: fly, shoot, dodge and win! And last but not least: have fun!
